about_the_game:
A 2D Action Arcade-like Platformer!
Featuring Mexican Battling Bakers Vs Man-Eating Plant Life from OUTER SPACE.
Hand drawn, animated, coded, designed, etc, etc by (mostly) one dude.

  • Enjoy simple controls to shoot and melee in different directions.
  • Shoot to stun enemies, melee them at close range! Hit stunned enemies for MASSIVE DAMAGE!
  • Fight in locales ranging from one of oldest cities in Mexico to An Alien Spaceship.
  • Pick up and play gameplay. Pick the controller, punch aliens!
  • Play solo or with a friend in local co-op.
  • About 20 short diverse stages for 45 to 60 minutes of breezy, gutsy action!
  • Replay to get better score! Bring a friend!
  • Two Characters to choose!
  • Featuring music by Tokyo Based Music Producer Ghostpops, and City-Pop Sensation Neko Milkshake and the Mex Lo-Fi Legend Palmasur.


* Note on coop: It requires two controllers connected to the same pc for local coop. For remote play, it requires one controller per pc.

A 2D Action Arcade-like Platformer!
Featuring Mexican Battling Bakers Vs Man-Eating Plant Life from OUTER SPACE.
Hand drawn, animated, coded, designed, etc, etc by (mostly) one dude.

  • Enjoy simple controls to shoot and melee in different directions.
  • Shoot to stun enemies, melee them at close range! Hit stunned enemies for MASSIVE DAMAGE!
  • Fight in locales ranging from one of oldest cities in Mexico to An Alien Spaceship.
  • Pick up and play gameplay. Pick the controller, punch aliens!
  • Play solo or with a friend in local co-op.
  • About 20 short diverse stages for 45 to 60 minutes of breezy, gutsy action!
  • Replay to get better score! Bring a friend!
  • Two Characters to choose!
  • Featuring music by Tokyo Based Music Producer Ghostpops, and City-Pop Sensation Neko Milkshake and the Mex Lo-Fi Legend Palmasur.


* Note on coop: It requires two controllers connected to the same pc for local coop. For remote play, it requires one controller per pc.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Distribution
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

name: El Panadero -The Baker-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

reviews:
“El Panadero is an action platformer with brutal attacks and a bizarre world. The hand-drawn backgrounds and levels are modeled after the creator's hometown, and the unique art style is squirming and alive. There is not a straight line in sight”
Indie Tsushin
short_description: Action Packed 2D Arcade Action Platformer featuring hand-drawn graphics. Armed with your fists (or a rolling pin) and a variety of bread-based boosts, fend of the Alien Plants, and avenge the Bakery they destroyed.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Korean, Romanian, Simplified Chinese
